BBK01.SU0003: Lending rates of banks / Current account credit of EUR 100,000 and more but less than EUR 500,000 / Highest rate of spread

General: Up to October 1996, loans of less than DM 1 million; from November 1996 up to December 2001, DM 200,000 and more but less than DM 1 million. Since January 1991 the rates of banks in the new Länder have been included in the interest rate survey. The spread is ascertained by eliminating the reports in the top 5% and the bottom 5% of the interest rate range.
